Package pl.polsl.model

Class DatabaseControler

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.model.DatabaseControler
public class DatabaseControler extends Object
A class for controlling the database operations.
Version:
3.0
Author:
Pawel Drzazga

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseControler

      public DatabaseControler(String dataBaseName) throws ModelException
      Constructor for the DatabaseController class. Initializes the database URL based on the provided database name.
      Parameters:
      dataBaseName - The name of the database file.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If the database file is not found, an exception is thrown with error code 1.

  • Method Details

    • deleteAccount

      public void deleteAccount(User user) throws ModelException
      Deletes the specified user account from the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user account to be deleted.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If there is an issue deleting the user account.

    • delete

      public int delete(String table, String collumn, int condition) throws ModelException
      Deletes rows from a table in the database based on a int condition.
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table from which to delete rows.
      collumn - The column in the table to use in the condition.
      condition - The condition to apply for deletion.
      Returns:
      The number of rows deleted.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If a SQL exception occurs during deletion, an exception with error code 4 is thrown.

    • insertUser

      public void insertUser(String userName, String password, int rank) throws ModelException
      Inserts a new user into the Users table in the database.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user to insert.
      password - The user's password.
      rank - The user's rank.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If a SQL exception occurs during insertion, an exception with error code 4 is thrown.

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(User user) throws ModelException
      Updates user information in the Users table in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object containing updated information.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If a SQL exception occurs during the update, an exception with error code 4 is thrown.

    • insertMovie

      public void insertMovie(Movie movie) throws ModelException
      Inserts a new movie into the Movies table in the database.
      Parameters:
      movie - The movie object to insert.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If a SQL exception occurs during insertion, an exception with error code 4 is thrown.

    • updateMovie

      public void updateMovie(Movie movie) throws ModelException
      Updates movie information in the Movies table in the database.
      Parameters:
      movie - The movie object containing updated information.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If a SQL exception occurs during the update, an exception with error code 4 is thrown.

    • getMovies

      public ArrayList<Movie> getMovies(Map<SearchCriterion,String> criteria) throws ModelException
      Returns a list of movies based on the specified search criteria. This method retrieves a list of movies that match the provided search criteria.
      Parameters:
      criteria - A map of search criteria, where keys are search terms (e.g., "author," "title," "genre," "year") and values are corresponding SearchCriterion enum values.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Movie objects that match the search criteria.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If there is an issue with the data model or data retrieval.

    • rentMovie

      public void rentMovie(User user, Movie movie) throws ModelException
      Rent the specified movie for the given user and create an entry in the Borrowings table.
      Parameters:
      user - The user renting the movie.
      movie - The movie to be rented.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If an error occurs while renting the movie.

    • endRental

      public int endRental(User user, Movie movie) throws ModelException
      End the rental of the specified movie by the given user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user ending the movie rental.
      movie - The movie to be returned.
      Returns:
      Amount of ended rentals.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If an error occurs while ending the rental.

    • getRentedMovies

      public ArrayList<Movie> getRentedMovies(User user) throws ModelException
      Get a list of movies rented by the specified user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user for whom to retrieve rented movies.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Movie objects representing the rented movies.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If an error occurs while retrieving the rented movies.

    • getRentingDate

      public String getRentingDate(User user, Movie movie, boolean mode) throws ModelException
      Gets the renting date information for a specific movie and user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user for whom the renting date is queried.
      movie - The movie for which the renting date is queried.
      mode - If true, returns the borrowing date; if false, returns the expiration date.
      Returns:
      The renting date information.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If there is an issue retrieving the renting date information.

    • checkRental

      public int checkRental(User user) throws ModelException
      Checks a user's rentals and removes expired rentals from the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object whose rentals are being checked.
      Returns:
      Deleted rows from Borrowing table.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If the user does not exist in the database or a SQL error occurs during database operations.

    • getBalance

      public double getBalance(String userName) throws ModelException
      Get the balance for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user.
      Returns:
      The balance of the user.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If there is an error while retrieving the balance or if the user is not found.

    • getRank

      public int getRank(String userName, String password) throws ModelException
      Checks a user's login credentials in the Users table in the database.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username to check.
      password - The user's password to validate.
      Returns:
      The user's rank if the login is successful.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If a SQL exception occurs during the check, an exception with error code 4 is thrown.
